about_the_game:
This game is a 2D Pixel Adventure Platformer where you need some running and jumping skills to get through an amazing story shown nicely in a form of comic book pages! There are many different endings depending on what ways you choose for Ronnie (the main character of this story) to go.

Don't hesitate to long! The Dreaming Dale is in danger and only Ronnie led by your decisions can save his beloved village!
detailed_description:
This game is a 2D Pixel Adventure Platformer where you need some running and jumping skills to get through an amazing story shown nicely in a form of comic book pages! There are many different endings depending on what ways you choose for Ronnie (the main character of this story) to go.

Don't hesitate to long! The Dreaming Dale is in danger and only Ronnie led by your decisions can save his beloved village!
name: 7WORLDS: The Dreaming Dale Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP, 32 or 64 bit
  • Processor: 1 GHz +
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: In game options, Screen Resolution set to 1920x1080! Very important to see the Story comic pages! XBox 360, Logitech F310, and Steam Controllers supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP, 32 or 64 bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz +, multicore
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: In game options, Screen Resolution set to 1920x1080! Very important to see the Story comic pages! XBox 360, Logitech F310, and Steam Controllers supported

Don't hesitate to long! The Dreaming Dale is in danger and only Ronnie led by your decisions can save his beloved village!
